title: Liam Hemsworth’s ‘new girlfriend’ Maddison Brown is actually a Miley Cyrus fan
text:
It turns out Liam Hemsworth’s ‘new girlfriend’ Maddison Brown is a Miley Cyrus fan (Picture: Getty)

Liam Hemsworth’s rumoured new girlfriend, Maddison Brown, is a Miley Cyrus fan – which might make for some awkward pillow talk.

The Hunger Games actor was spotted holding hands with the Dynasty actress two months after his marriage ended, sparking speculation he had moved on from the We Can’t Stop singer.

As well as the PDA, the 29-year-old was also pictured grabbing a bite to eat with his new pal, with the ‘lovebirds’ seen dining at Sant Ambroeus, in New York.

However, months before they were photographed together – and back when he was still married to his now-ex – the 22-year-old liked a tweet from the singer, revealing she’s a fan.

Taking to Twitter on 11 April, Miley shared a photo of herself as Hannah Montana, paying tribute to the character.

‘Happy Anniversary to this queen,’ she wrote, alongside ‘#HMTHEMOVIE.’

Maddison gave Miley’s tweet a little like (Picture: Twitter)

And, nestled among the 615.8k people who liked the post was Maddison, which is slightly awkward…

Liam and Miley split back in August, 10 years after they first met and just eight months after they tied the knot.

The 26-year-old sent the world into total meltdown after she passionately kissed Kaitlynn Carter, while on a trip to Lake Como, in Italy.

Shortly after, her reps confirmed her split from Chris Hemsworth’s brother, with a statement reading: ‘Liam and Miley have agreed to separate at this time.

Miley and Liam confirmed their split in August (Picture: Rex)

‘Ever-evolving, changing as partners and individuals, they have decided this is what’s best while they both focus on themselves and careers.

‘They still remain dedicated parents to all of their animals they share while lovingly taking this time apart. Please respect their process and privacy.’

Liam later shared on Instagram: ‘Hi all. Just a quick note to say that Miley and I have recently separated and I wish her nothing but health and happiness going forward.

‘This is a private matter and I have not made, nor will I be making, any comments to any journalists or media outlets. Any reported quotes attributed to me are false. Peace and Love.’

It’s no surprise the Neighbours star has chosen to get back on the dating scene, considering his ex is onto her second post-marriage relationship.

After her brief fling with Kaitlynn ended, Miley was pictured kissing Cody Simpson, even referring to the musician as her ‘boyfriend’ recently.
